title: 12. Who can get Ebola?
content:
- Anybody who comes into contact with body fluids from an infected person. This may occur during care of the sick person at home or in a hospital.
 - Persons involved in cleaning and dressing the body of a person who has died of Ebola.
 - Persons handling chimpanzees, gorillas, bats, monkeys or forest antelopes' infected with the Ebola.
 - Mourners who get into contact with the body of a person who has died of Ebola as part of burial ritual or
ceremony.
